tasks.label: Generate gRPC stubs
tasks.command: sudo apt install -y python3-grpc-tools python3-grpcio python3-protobuf python3-setuptools && mkdir -p omnii/grpc_stubs && python3 -m grpc_tools.protoc -I=omnii/proto --python_out=omnii/grpc_stubs --grpc_python_out=omnii/grpc_stubs omnii/proto/omnnii.proto
